data.name: ReadProgramCheckpointRestart
data.value: select top(1) PROGRAM_NAME, UPDATE_FREQUENCY_C, READ_FREQUENCY_COU, CHECKPOINT_COUNT, LST_CHKPNT_TMST, RESTART_IND, RESTART_INFO from CKT_PGM_CHKPNT_RST where PROGRAM_NAME = @programName

data.name: UpdateProgramCheckpointRestart
data.value: update CKT_PGM_CHKPNT_RST set UPDATE_FREQUENCY_C = @updateFrequencyC, READ_FREQUENCY_COU = @readFrequencyCou, CHECKPOINT_COUNT = @checkpointCount, LST_CHKPNT_TMST = @lstChkpntTmst, RESTART_IND = @restartInd, RESTART_INFO = @restartInfo where PROGRAM_NAME = @programName
